dcterms:creator: B. H. Menze
A. Jakab
S. Bauer
e. a. Kalpathy-Cramer
dcterms:description: BRATS2018 comprises 285 cases with publicly available ground truth annotations. The dataset consists of multi-contrast MRI exams, encompassing four sequences: FLAIR, T1, T1c, and T2.
dcterms:title: BRATS2018

dcterms:creator: B. H. Menze
A. Jakab
S. Bauer
e. a. Kalpathy-Cramer
dcterms:description: The BraTS2020 dataset encompasses MRI scans of brain tumors meticulously annotated with ground truth segmentations. It includes a diverse array of brain tumor types, including gliomas, and offers multimodal imaging data, incorporating T1-weighted, T1-weighted with contrast enhancement, T2-weighted, and FLAIR MRI sequences.
dcterms:title: BRATS2020
